name: Fayda Games
description: Fayda is an exciting and simple web3 PvP game, the smart contract of which is a hybrid of the game itself and the BEP-20 token, interacting with the liquidity pool contract. All processes occurring in the game are interconnected and directly affect the overall supply and rate of the FAYD token. Participants have complete control over the entire gameplay, creating new games, taking part in them, and influencing the results of previous games.
